Name:
USS Abel P. Upshur
USCGD Abel P. Upshur
HMS Clare
Namesake:
Abel Parker Upshur
Previous name retained
Fate:
Transferred to U.S. Coast Guard 5 November 1930
Transferred to United Kingdom 9 September 1940
Transferred to U.S. Navy 21 May 1934
Sold and scrapped 1947
Acquired:
21 May 1934 (from U.S. Coast Guard)
5 November 1930 (from U.S. Navy)
9 September 1940
Armament:
4 x 4 in (100 mm) guns
1 x 3 in (76 mm) gun
12 x 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
